surface.title: AI Investment Insights
surface.description: Quick, mobile-first market briefs powered by fixture data until live model hooks are enabled.

autoRefresh.helperTemplate: Auto-refreshes every {minutes}m while this panel is open.

statusTones.onTrackDescription: Data is still within the refresh window.
statusTones.dueNowDescription: Refresh now to keep signals timely.

staleCallout.title: Stale insights detected
staleCallout.description: One or more cards are older than 45 minutes. Request a fresh insight before acting.

emptyState.title: No insights match these filters yet
emptyState.description: Try widening your horizon or confidence filters to bring fixture insights back.

fixtures.headline: Momentum remains elevated after earnings
fixtures.summary: Revenue guidance and data-center demand are still the dominant tailwinds, but valuation sensitivity is high.

fixtures.headline: Defensive rotation may cushion volatility
fixtures.summary: Healthcare breadth has improved while macro uncertainty rises, supporting lower-beta allocation ideas.

fixtures.headline: Small-cap breakout watchlist is expanding
fixtures.summary: Breadth improved over the past week; confirmation still depends on sustained volume and rate expectations.
